A Garland of Classics
Riddings, Derbyshire Promoted by Riddings United Silver Prize Band
Prizes - 1st £10 and cup, 2nd £7, 3rd £4, 4th £2. March contest - 1st(£1) Hucknall, 2nd(10s.) Huthwaite. 6 bands competed.
